## Checklist

- [ ] Code passes all quality gates (isort, black, ruff, mypy for Python;
  eslint, prettier for TypeScript)
- [ ] Tests are added/updated and pass locally
- [ ] Coverage requirements are met (core ≥95%, other ≥85%)
- [ ] No secrets committed (API keys, tokens, internal URLs)
- [ ] Architecture principles respected
- [ ] Related ADRs reviewed (if applicable)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if changing behavior or adding features)
